thread.title: Broadway Musicals, Big Draw in Brazil for a Decade, Lose Their Audience

title: Broadway Musicals, Big Draw in Brazil for a Decade, Lose Their Audience
text:
Published By: NYTimes Arts - Today 
With unemployment and inflation up, and the currency down, ticket sales for imported shows are plummeting....
